page.title: 05Horses in Howden-le-Wear (2)
page.content: They have a dog called Shelly and a couple of cats. One of her horses has a bad throat and another has a bad foot.Sometimes she uses the horses for working. She mucks the stables out every day. Miss Wakefield's favourite horse is called Ralph. The colour of the 2 horses that she rides are black and chestnut. Not all of her horses wear horse shoes only the ones that work.{Her most expensive horse was {about Â£2000}or more but she is not sure. Miss Wakefield likes to ride them every day to exercise them.
